election_record.label: New York 1824 Lieutenant Governor

sub_unit.name: Four
sub_unit.note: James Tallmadge received 3 votes as James Tallmadge, Jr.

sub_unit.name: Richmond
sub_unit.note: "Statement of votes given at an election held in the said county, on the first days of November, 1824, and the two succeeding days inclusive." New York American, for the Country (New York, NY). November 13, 1824.

sub_unit.name: Dutchess
sub_unit.note: Samuel Young received 1 vote as S. Young.

sub_unit.name: Montgomery
sub_unit.note: DeWitt Clinton received 1 vote as Dewit Cliton.

sub_unit.name: Rockland
sub_unit.note: "Tallmadge was the People's Candidate." The New-York Statesman (Albany, NY). November 5, 1824.

sub_unit.name: Albany
sub_unit.note: James Tallmadge received 2 votes as James Tallmadge, Jr. and 1 vote as Tallmadge.

sub_unit.name: Rensselaer
sub_unit.note: James Tallmadge received 1 vote as J. Tallmadge and 1 vote as James Talm.

sub_unit.name: Essex
sub_unit.note: James Tallmadge received 1 vote as Tallmadge.

sub_unit.name: Montgomery
sub_unit.note: James Tallmadge received 1 vote as Tallmadge and 1 vote as Jam. Tallmadge.
Erastus Root received 2 votes as E. Root.

sub_unit.name: Lewis
sub_unit.note: One vote for James Tallmadge (correct spelling) was listed in the scattering votes.

sub_unit.name: Tioga
sub_unit.note: James Tallmadge received 6 votes as J. Tallmadge, 1 vote as Tallmadge and 1 vote as Jas. T.

sub_unit.name: Onondaga
sub_unit.note: James Tallmadge received 1 vote as Tallmadge.
Erastus Root received 4 votes as Erastus and 1 vote as Erstus R.
Ames Tallmage received 1 vote as Ames Tallmadge.

sub_unit.name: Canandaigus
sub_unit.note: John Taylor received 1 vote as John Tayler.

sub_unit.name: Seneca
sub_unit.note: "Root was a King Caucus candidate while Tallmadge was affiliated with the People's Party." Seneca Farmer (Waterloo, NY). November 17, 1824

sub_unit.name: Genesee
sub_unit.note: James Tallmadge received 2 vote as Tallmadge.

sub_unit.name: Livingston
sub_unit.note: James Tallmadge received 1 vote as J. Tallmadge.
